QuestData.Title: Fly Over
QuestData.Description: I'm quite adept at riding my flying carpet. Unfortunately, when I tried to investigate what the cultists had uncovered up at the Masters' Gate, they nearly shot me down.$B$BYou look as if you might be skilled with the flying reins as well. Would you mind flying up there to the southwest to see what they've unearthed?
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the central area in the back of the Masters' Gate.
QuestData.CompletionText: What did you see? What are the Twilight's Hammer doing at the Masters' Gate?
QuestData.RewardText: A waygate?! They unearthed a Titan waygate.$B$BThis is very interesting and potentially very bad.
